command.description: List namespace on NVMe device
Get nvme namespace information

parameter.name: namespace
parameter.description: ID of namespace to get information from. ID starts from 1

field.name: Deallocated or Unwritten Logical Block Error Support
PI in First Eight Bytes of Metadata Support
PI in Last Eight Bytes of Metadata Support
Write Exclusive Registrants Only Reservation Type Support
Exclusive Access Registrants Only Reservation Type Support

Exclusive Access All Registrants Reservation Type Support

format-parameters.format-parameter: Namespace Size,Namespace Capacity,Namespace Utilization,Thin Provisioning Support,Namespace Atomic Support,Deallocated or Unwritten Logical Block Error Support,Number of LBA Formats,LBA Format,Extended Metadata,Metadata as Seperate Buffer Support,Metadata as Extended Buffer Support,PI Type 1 Support,PI Type 2 Support,PI Type 3 Support,PI in First Eight Bytes of Metadata Support,PI in Last Eight Bytes of Metadata Support,PI Enabled Type,MetaData Location,Namespace Shared by Multiple Controllers,Persist Through Power Loss Support,Write Exclusive Reservation Type Support,Exclusive Access Reservation Type Support,Write Exclusive Registrants Only Reservation Type Support,Exclusive Access Registrants Only Reservation Type Support,Write Exclusive All Registrants Reservation Type Support,Exclusive Access All Registrants Reservation Type Support,Format Progress Indicator Support,Percentage Remains to Be Formatted,Namespace Atomic Write Unit Normal,Namespace Atomic Write Unit Power Fail,Namespace Atomic Compare and Write Unit,Namespace Atomic Boundary Size Normal,Namespace Atomic Boundary Offset,Namespace Atomic Boundary Size Power Fail,NVM Capacity,Namespace Globally Unique Identifier,IEEE Extended Unique Identifier,LBA Format Support

command.description: Change namespace format

parameter.name: ses
parameter.description: Secure Erase Settings(SES). 0: No secure erase operation requested. 1: User Data Erase. 2: Cryptographic Erase.

parameter.name: pi
parameter.description: Protection Information(PI). 0: Protection information is not enabled. 1: Protection information is enabled, Type 1. 2: Protection information is enabled, Type 2. 3: Protection information is enabled, Type 3.

parameter.name: pil
parameter.description: Protection Information Location(PIL). 0: PI is transferred as the last eight bytes of metadata, if PI is enabled. 1: PI is transferred as the first eight bytes of metadata, if PI is enabled.

parameter.name: ms
parameter.description: Metadata Settings(MS). 0: Metadata is transferred as part of a separate buffer. 1: Metadata is transferred as part of an extended data LBA.

command.description: Get NVMe device error log information

parameter.name: elpe
parameter.description: Error log page entries. This value indicates the number of log entries you wish to get. The maximum number of entries supported is device-specific.

field.name: Byte in Command That Contained the Error
Bit in Command That Contained the Error

format-parameters.format-parameter: Error Count,Submission Queue ID,Command ID,Status Field,Byte in Command That Contained the Error,Bit in Command That Contained the Error,LBA,Namespace,Vendor Specific Information Available

command.description: Get NVMe device SMART log information

parameter.name: namespace
parameter.description: Namespace ID. If log page is supported on a per namespace basis this value indicates the ID of namespace you wish to get log from. This parameter can be omitted to request global log page.

field.name: Number of Error Info Log Entries

format-parameters.format-parameter: Available Spare Space Below Threshold,Temperature Warning,NVM Subsystem Reliability Degradation,Read Only Mode,Volatile Memory Backup Device Failure,Composite Temperature,Available Spare,Available Spare Threshold,Percentage Used,Data Units Read,Data Units Written,Host Read Commands,Host Write Commands,Controller Busy Time,Power Cycles,Power On Hours,Unsafe Shutdowns,Media Errors,Number of Error Info Log Entries,Warning Composite Temperature Time,Critical Composite Temperature Time,Temperature Sensor 1,Temperature Sensor 2,Temperature Sensor 3,Temperature Sensor 4,Temperature Sensor 5,Temperature Sensor 6,Temperature Sensor 7,Temperature Sensor 8

command.description: Get NVMe device firmware slot log information

field.name: Firmware Slot to Be Activated at Next Controller Reset

format-parameters.format-parameter: Firmware Slot to Be Activated at Next Controller Reset,Firmware Slot Being Activated,Firmware Revision for Slot 1,Firmware Revision for Slot 2,Firmware Revision for Slot 3,Firmware Revision for Slot 4,Firmware Revision for Slot 5,Firmware Revision for Slot 6,Firmware Revision for Slot 7

command.description: Get NVMe device feature arbitration information

format-parameters.format-parameter: Arbitration Burst,Low Priority Weight,Medium Priority Weight,High Priority Weight

command.description: Set NVMe device feature arbitration information

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Arbitration Burst value to be set

parameter.name: value2
parameter.description: Low Priority Weight value to be set

parameter.name: value3
parameter.description: Medium Priority Weight value to be set

parameter.name: value4
parameter.description: High Priority Weight value to be set

command.description: Get NVMe device feature power management information
Set NVMe device feature power management information

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Power state value to be set

command.description: Get NVMe device feature temperature threshold information
Set NVMe device feature temperature threshold information

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Temperature threshold value to be set

command.description: Get NVMe device feature error recovery information
Set NVMe device feature error recovery information

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Time limited error recovery value to be set

command.description: Get NVMe device feature volatile write cache information
Set NVMe device feature volatile write cache information

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Volitale write cache enable value to be set, 0 for false (disable), 1 for true (enable)

command.description: Get NVMe device feature number of queue information

format-parameters.format-parameter: Number of Submission Queues Allocated,Number of Completion Queues Allocated

command.description: Get NVMe device feature interrupt coalescing information
Set NVMe device feature interrupt coalescing information

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Aggregation threshold value to be set

parameter.name: value2
parameter.description: Aggregation time value to be set

command.description: Get NVMe device feature interrupt vector configuration information
Set NVMe device feature interrupt vector configuration information

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Interrupt vector value to be set

parameter.name: value2
parameter.description: Coalescing disable value to be set, 0 for false (enable), 1 for true (disable)

command.description: Get NVMe device feature write atomicity information
Set NVMe device feature write atomicity information

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: Disable Normal value to be set, 0 for false (enable), 1 for true (disable)

command.description: Get NVMe device feature async event configuration information

format-parameters.format-parameter: Available Spare Space,Temperature,Media Error,Read Only Mode,Backup Device Fail

command.description: Set NVMe device feature async event configuration information

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: SMART health critical warnings bitmap to be set, refer to Figure 79, NVMe 1.2 SPEC

command.description: Download firmware image to a specific slot
Activate firmware image in a specific slot
Dump NVMe device registers
Set NVMe driver log level and debug level

parameter.name: loglevel
parameter.description: Log level. This value is used to manupulate NVMe driver parameter: nvme_log_level. 1: error 2: warning 3: info 4: verbose 5: debug

parameter.name: debuglevel
parameter.description: Debug level(hex int format). When log level is 5, this value is used to manupulate NVMe driver parameter: nvme_dbg. This parameter can be omitted to indicate value 0. BIT_0: Print ctrlr level log BIT_1: Print namespace level log BIT_2: Print queue level log BIT_3: Print IO command level log BIT_4: Print admin command level log BIT_5: Print management level log BIT_6: Print exception handler log BIT_14: Print init/cleanup log BIT_15: Print temp log BIT_16: Dump SG array BIT_17: Dump PRP BIT_18: Dump cdb BIT_19: Dump NVM command BIT_20: Dump completion queue entry BIT_21: Dump user passthru data BIT_22: Dump namespace info BIT_23: Dump timeout info BIT_24: Dump smart log info

command.description: Set timeout value for IO timeout checker

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: IO timeout seconds for internal checker. Maximum timeout value is 40. 0: disable timeout checker.

command.description: Get timeout value of IO timeout checker
